LABEL: 0x31F
STRING: I followed their lead and started walking.

LABEL: 0x345
STRING: Touri was walking down the hallway happily.

LABEL: 0x37B
STRING: I could hear the sound of her clacking footsteps.

LABEL: 0x3A5
STRING: She looked like she might start humming at any moment.

LABEL: 0x3D7
STRING: Her back became increasingly distant as she walked ahead of me by herself.

LABEL: 0x424
STRING: It hadn't even been that long since we left, but...

LABEL: 0x468
STRING: I couldn't keep up with her at all.

LABEL: 0x496
STRING: 「Touri, wait up!」

LABEL: 0x4C9
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x4E4
STRING: She stopped and turned around.

LABEL: 0x582
STRING: 「Hey, Katagiri-san, are you okay?」

LABEL: 0x5AA
STRING: 「Do your feet hurt?」

LABEL: 0x5D7
STRING: 「No, that's not it...」

LABEL: 0x5FF
STRING: 「I feel kind of strange, but I think I'll be fine.」

LABEL: 0x62B
STRING: Damn it.

LABEL: 0x64D
STRING: I should be able to walk properly, even if I was tired.

LABEL: 0x6A7
STRING: This wasn't the time to make Touri worry about me. I was the one who was supposed to be protecting her.

LABEL: 0x76B
STRING: 「You don't look fine at all... You really should rest.」

LABEL: 0x7A7
STRING: 「You're showing symptoms of paralysis.」

LABEL: 0x7D7
STRING: 「Walking around isn't doing you any favors as far as healing goes.」

LABEL: 0x824
STRING: That was probably less his personal opinion and more his opinion as a doctor.

LABEL: 0x86C
STRING: But... paralysis?

LABEL: 0x890
STRING: I no longer felt anything wrong with my sense of touch.

LABEL: 0x8C8
STRING: All that was left was fatigue.

LABEL: 0x8F0
STRING: 「No... I'm fine.」

LABEL: 0x921
STRING: 「But, you can't even walk properly, can you?」

LABEL: 0x95A
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0x976
STRING: 「I'm probably just tired.」

LABEL: 0x9A2
STRING: 「I won't deny that I feel fatigued, but that doesn't mean I need to rest.」

LABEL: 0x9FC
STRING: 「Sorry for worrying you... But, I don't want to cause you any more trouble.」

LABEL: 0xA7C
STRING: Hiragino looked at me in thought as I told him my honest feelings.

LABEL: 0xABE
STRING: A rustling sound reverberated between us as we came to a stop.

LABEL: 0xB00
STRING: In the emergency room earlier, Hiragino had grabbed a large number of tablets and stuffed them into his pocket on his way out.

LABEL: 0xB5E
STRING: Hiragino scratched his head, his doctor's coat fluttering.

LABEL: 0xBFE
STRING: 「I know you want to think that your symptoms aren't serious.」

LABEL: 0xC3A
STRING: 「Still, that's no reason for you to not rest.」

LABEL: 0xCD1
STRING: 「It's a miracle that you can walk so soon after all those injuries in the first place.」

LABEL: 0xD1F
STRING: 「You should go rest in a room somewhere.」

LABEL: 0xE60
STRING: I tried to refute his words, but hesitated as light vertigo hit me.

LABEL: 0xEA0
STRING: ...I didn't want to admit it, but I might be at my limit.

LABEL: 0xEE0
STRING: Thinking rationally, there was no way that the damage I suffered from the explosion was all gone.

LABEL: 0xF48
STRING: And besides――

LABEL: 0xF60
STRING: Even if that wasn't the case, there was no reason to stubbornly refuse to rest.

LABEL: 0xF9E
STRING: They could manage without me.

LABEL: 0xFCE
STRING: Or, to be more precise, there was nothing for them to find.

LABEL: 0xFF8
STRING: The outcome of this search was already determined.

LABEL: 0x1026
STRING: Hiragino and Touri would continue searching for Reiri while I rested.

LABEL: 0x1071
STRING: They would continue to chase after a phantom that didn't exist.

LABEL: 0x10A5
STRING: The phantom of a girl who'd died inside that rescue ship――

LABEL: 0x1136
STRING: It was futile.

LABEL: 0x1158
STRING: But that didn't mean that I had to tell Touri about Reiri's death.

LABEL: 0x11AC
STRING: How would she react if she heard it from me now?

LABEL: 0x11EA
STRING: An observer looking at a rat from above might laugh at its shallow hopes.

LABEL: 0x123A
STRING: Or, they might weep at the emptiness of it all.

LABEL: 0x1270
STRING: However, that did not give them the right to intervene in the world.

LABEL: 0x12B6
STRING: ――I must not crush Touri's hope.

LABEL: 0x12E6
STRING: I mustn't take away the possibility that Reiri was still somewhere out there.

LABEL: 0x1326
STRING: As long as the possibility existed, she could have hope.

LABEL: 0x1372
STRING: Think――

LABEL: 0x138E
STRING: What should I do?

LABEL: 0x13B0
STRING: Don't run away. Face the situation head-on and figure out the best method――

LABEL: 0x14BA
STRING: 「It's all right, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x14E0
STRING: 「Don't look so worried!」

LABEL: 0x156D
STRING: 「Do I really look that unreliable...?」

LABEL: 0x15A2
STRING: 「No, that's not why――」

LABEL: 0x163C
STRING: 「Then, you can leave it to me!」

LABEL: 0x1667
STRING: Touri puffed out her chest playfully.

LABEL: 0x168B
STRING: As if she was trying to comfort me.

LABEL: 0x16DD
STRING: ...I felt pathetic.

LABEL: 0x1703
STRING: She was the one who was most worried about Reiri.

LABEL: 0x1735
STRING: Besides, even though Reiri had said she'd tell Touri everything, there were still some things she hadn't told her.

LABEL: 0x1795
STRING: So, she must naturally feel anxious.

LABEL: 0x17B5
STRING: It was embarrassing to have her worry about me like that.

LABEL: 0x17EF
STRING: 「...You're not going to find her if you search randomly, you know?」

LABEL: 0x182B
STRING: I warned her just in case.

LABEL: 0x184D
STRING: It might sound mean, but this was probably better than inflating her hopes carelessly.

LABEL: 0x18A3
STRING: Touri, however, didn't seem discouraged by my warning.

LABEL: 0x194B
STRING: 「It'll be fine. You worry too much!」

LABEL: 0x198B
STRING: 「I know where Reiri is.」

LABEL: 0x19D2
STRING: 「What?!」

LABEL: 0x1A27
STRING: Touri made her declaration without a care in the world.

LABEL: 0x1A49
STRING: She looked a little apologetic seeing our surprise...

LABEL: 0x1A8D
STRING: Like she had pulled a harmless prank.

LABEL: 0x1B82
STRING: 「You know where she is...? Are you serious?」

LABEL: 0x1C36
STRING: 「Yeah... Sorry for hiding it.」

LABEL: 0x1C69
STRING: ――So that's how it was.

LABEL: 0x1C95
STRING: That was why she had stayed with me until I woke up,

LABEL: 0x1CD7
STRING: even though Reiri was missing.

LABEL: 0x1D11
STRING: Up until now, she had fallen to the verge of madness if Reiri was out of her sight.

LABEL: 0x1D65
STRING: So, why had she remained calm this time?

LABEL: 0x1D93
STRING: She had known all along where Reiri was.

LABEL: 0x1DC9
STRING: She knew where her sister was, so she felt like she could look after me...

LABEL: 0x1E47
STRING: No, if that was it――

LABEL: 0x1E69
STRING: Reiri might have used her own sister to spy on us.

LABEL: 0x1EB3
STRING: However, even that conspiracy-like theory was nothing more than a delusion now that she was gone.

LABEL: 0x1FCC
STRING: 「So, I'm off to get her!」

LABEL: 0x2004
STRING: 「Take care of Katagiri-san, Hiragino-sensei.」

LABEL: 0x2041
STRING: 「You're going alone?」

LABEL: 0x20CF
STRING: 「Yeah. You can leave it to me! POL's with me too, so don't worry.」

LABEL: 0x2145
STRING: Her destination was where she thought Reiri should be.

LABEL: 0x217D
STRING: But, she wouldn't find her sister there.

LABEL: 0x21A5
STRING: There was no way she would be there.

LABEL: 0x21C3
STRING: Because right now, she was...

LABEL: 0x21E7
STRING: Touri's back was receding into the distance.

LABEL: 0x22C3
STRING: ――This was bad. I couldn't let her go.

LABEL: 0x22F1
STRING: 「Hey, wait――」

LABEL: 0x2328
STRING: 「You just stay still, Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x237D
STRING: Her figure grew more distant.

LABEL: 0x2399
STRING: Touri disappeared at the end of the gently arcing hallway.

LABEL: 0x23D9
STRING: ...I couldn't let her go... I had to stop her...

LABEL: 0x2472
STRING: 「Hiragino-san, we have to stop her.」

LABEL: 0x24CC
STRING: Hiragino watched Touri leave in silence.

LABEL: 0x2500
STRING: What the hell was he doing...?

LABEL: 0x2524
STRING: 「Hiragino-san!」

LABEL: 0x2540
STRING: 「We can't let her go out there alone when there could be someone else on board――」

LABEL: 0x25FA
STRING: 「It's fine.」

LABEL: 0x2673
STRING: 「More importantly, can you walk a little further?」

LABEL: 0x26A8
STRING: Hiragino admonished me in a calm tone.

LABEL: 0x26F4
STRING: Having lost my energy, he grabbed me by the arm and took me to the nearest crew room.

LABEL: 0x2A68
STRING: In the dimly lit room, Hiragino and I were alone.

LABEL: 0x2A91
STRING: I sat down on the bed and leaned my upper body against the wall.

LABEL: 0x2AD3
STRING: Immediately, a feeling of exhaustion washed over me.

LABEL: 0x2B05
STRING: 「Haah...」

LABEL: 0x2B1F
STRING: My sigh came out naturally.

LABEL: 0x2B3F
STRING: Apparently, I was more tired than I thought.

LABEL: 0x2B75
STRING: I had been asleep just a moment ago... or rather, unconscious, but I was already feeling sleepy again.

LABEL: 0x2BE2
STRING: 「Are you feeling okay?」

LABEL: 0x2C03
STRING: Hiragino handed me a cup of water as he asked.

LABEL: 0x2C47
STRING: After taking a sip, the water seemed to soak into my tired body.

LABEL: 0x2C81
STRING: Hiragino took out a number of tablets from his coat with a jingle.

LABEL: 0x2CD3
STRING: He popped them into his mouth all at once.

LABEL: 0x2CFD
STRING: That was definitely not healthy...

LABEL: 0x2D99
STRING: 「――Haah... I feel revived!」

LABEL: 0x2DC8
STRING: 「Really...?」

LABEL: 0x2DE6
STRING: Saying that after swallowing all those bitter tablets...

LABEL: 0x2E24
STRING: I wasn't so much worried as I was stunned.

LABEL: 0x2EAD
STRING: As I stared at him in a daze, Hiragino brought his face close to mine.

LABEL: 0x2EF7
STRING: Th-That's way too close.

LABEL: 0x2F0F
STRING: And, there was nothing about this that made me happy, unlike with Touri...

LABEL: 0x2F49
STRING: ...We stared at each other for a few seconds.

LABEL: 0x2F6F
STRING: 「W-What is it...?」

LABEL: 0x3017
STRING: 「...Sorry. I just really wanted to be alone with you.」

LABEL: 0x305C
STRING: 「Get away from me.」

LABEL: 0x3074
STRING: Why was he saying that again...?

LABEL: 0x3101
STRING: 「Stop joking around...」

LABEL: 0x3125
STRING: 「Was it really okay to let Touri go by herself?」

LABEL: 0x3159
STRING: 「There's "someone" besides us on this ship.」

LABEL: 0x3191
STRING: 「If they attack Touri――」

LABEL: 0x322F
STRING: 「As I said, there's no need to worry about that.」

LABEL: 0x3260
STRING: Hiragino immediately denied my words.

LABEL: 0x3282
STRING: How... could he be so sure?

LABEL: 0x331E
STRING: 「This "someone"...」

LABEL: 0x33AD
STRING: 「You must be talking about the man in ROMLES uniform who was attacked by <COOS>, right?」

LABEL: 0x3402
STRING: 「Yeah... Wait.」

LABEL: 0x343A
STRING: ――That was strange.

LABEL: 0x3456
STRING: Something felt off about his words.

LABEL: 0x3480
STRING: Did Hiragino ever see him?

LABEL: 0x34B4
STRING: At that time... when Tokiwa was killed by <COOS>,

LABEL: 0x34FE
STRING: only Tokiwa, Reiri, Yukari, and I were there.

LABEL: 0x35A5
STRING: So, how did Hiragino know he was wearing a ROMLES uniform?

LABEL: 0x3601
STRING: Various possibilities were running through my head.

LABEL: 0x3627
STRING: What had happened?

LABEL: 0x3645
STRING: What had Hiragino done?

LABEL: 0x3667
STRING: As I remained silent, he quietly opened his mouth.

LABEL: 0x36B0
STRING: 「It's just as you think.」

LABEL: 0x36F0
STRING: 「I... took his life.」

LABEL: 0x371F
STRING: 「What――」

LABEL: 0x379A
STRING: That was ridiculous.

LABEL: 0x37B0
STRING: That was impossible... Not for anyone else, but for Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x38D0
STRING: 「I won't abandon someone if there's a chance to save them.」

LABEL: 0x3917
STRING: Hiragino valued human life more than anyone else and tried to save people no matter how low the chances were.

LABEL: 0x396D
STRING: He had always stuck to his beliefs... with no regard for the danger he would put himself in.

LABEL: 0x3A79
STRING: How could he take someone's life――?

LABEL: 0x3AB4
STRING: 「He was glowing.」

LABEL: 0x3B04
STRING: 「He was infected with <COOS>, yet he was still alive.」

LABEL: 0x3B62
STRING: 「So, that's why, with my own two hands, I...」

LABEL: 0x3B93
STRING: Hiragino clutched his head.

LABEL: 0x3BB1
STRING: I couldn't see his face as he hung his head.

LABEL: 0x3BD9
STRING: Silence.

LABEL: 0x3BED
STRING: Now that even the air conditioning had stopped working, it felt as if time had stopped.

LABEL: 0x3C31
STRING: In the slowly settling silence, Hiragino eventually started talking.

LABEL: 0x3C8C
STRING: 「After your operation, Momoi told me she'd go check the wheelhouse.」

LABEL: 0x3D2B
STRING: 「I thought about looking after you, but Touri said she would stay with you instead.」

LABEL: 0x3D85
STRING: 「At that time, I remembered something important.」

LABEL: 0x3DB9
STRING: 「In addition to Reiri-kun's disappearance, there was one more thing.」

LABEL: 0x3DF5
STRING: 「――We hadn't confirmed if Tokiwa-kun was dead.」

LABEL: 0x3E58
STRING: Hiragino spoke in a plain tone.

LABEL: 0x3E80
STRING: However, the moment he said Tokiwa's name, I could hear his voice tremble.

LABEL: 0x3F34
STRING: 「We hadn't checked... whether Tokiwa-kun was dead or not at the scene yet.」

LABEL: 0x3F80
STRING: 「And, we also had to find the missing Reiri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x3FC4
STRING: 「Either way, now that <COOS> was gone,

LABEL: 0x405B
STRING: we had to patrol the ship and assess the situation, right?」

LABEL: 0x40F8
STRING: 「Whatever the case was, I was able to come up with an endless number of reasons.」

LABEL: 0x4144
STRING: 「Driven by a faint hope... or rather, a sense of duty,

LABEL: 0x4190
STRING: I went and explored the dark interior of this ship.」

LABEL: 0x4233
STRING: Tokiwa's death.

LABEL: 0x424D
STRING: It was a tragedy that had happened right in front of my eyes, and if anything, I'd been directly involved in it.

LABEL: 0x4356
STRING: I had to save Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x438C
STRING: I was the only one who could have reached out to her.

LABEL: 0x443D
STRING: And yet, I took Reiri's hand instead of hers.

LABEL: 0x447F
STRING: What was I thinking back then?

LABEL: 0x44AB
STRING: There was no reason.

LABEL: 0x44C9
STRING: Because it wasn't a choice at all.

LABEL: 0x455F
STRING: No... That wasn't quite right...

LABEL: 0x457F
STRING: I didn't intend to make a choice.

LABEL: 0x45A7
STRING: I hadn't realized it at the time―the choice before me.

LABEL: 0x4642
STRING: We were walking around blindfolded.

LABEL: 0x4678
STRING: We weren't being pulled along by anyone, but simply went in the direction we wanted to go.

LABEL: 0x46CC
STRING: And so, it was only after walking the path that the blindfold was removed and we learned...

LABEL: 0x476B
STRING: ...About the infinite possibilities other than the path we'd taken.

LABEL: 0x47A3
STRING: About the existence of options that we had abandoned without even realizing.

LABEL: 0x47DB
STRING: Hiragino had gone to check the scene of that choice again.

LABEL: 0x481B
STRING: Tokiwa, the abandoned choice――

LABEL: 0x490B
STRING: 「In the process, I found him...」

LABEL: 0x493B
STRING: 「He was inside a flooded guest room in the rear section.」

LABEL: 0x4978
STRING: 「In a guest room?」

LABEL: 0x4992
STRING: The place where he and Tokiwa were attacked by <COOS> should have been the bridge.

LABEL: 0x49D8
STRING: Hiragino nodded slightly.

LABEL: 0x4A64
STRING: 「When I saw him crawling inside the guest room, I immediately recalled what I'd heard from you two.」

LABEL: 0x4AB2
STRING: 「About a man that was attacked along with Tokiwa-kun...」

LABEL: 0x4AEE
STRING: 「I no longer had any doubts as to who he was.」

LABEL: 0x4B2C
STRING: 「...His body was glowing.」

LABEL: 0x4B67
STRING: 「He was infected with <COOS>...?」

LABEL: 0x4C11
STRING: 「Yes. And of all things... he was still alive.」

LABEL: 0x4C5A
STRING: He was alive even after being attacked――

LABEL: 0x4C8C
STRING: I naturally thought back to the crustaceans that were infected with <COOS>.

LABEL: 0x4CD2
STRING: They were creatures that had lost their will and were controlled by the bacteria.

LABEL: 0x4D12
STRING: And, that man was infected in the same way――

LABEL: 0x4DA6
STRING: 「We thought we had destroyed <COOS>, but it was still alive inside him.」

LABEL: 0x4DFE
STRING: 「And... he was weakened.」

LABEL: 0x4E2A
STRING: 「I thought that he probably didn't have long to live.」

LABEL: 0x4E89
STRING: Just then, I realized something.

LABEL: 0x4EAF
STRING: Hiragino's face was paler than I had ever seen before.

LABEL: 0x4EF3
STRING: It was as if he was scared... As if he was facing something unknown.

LABEL: 0x4F39
STRING: As he shivered like he was freezing, I saw his expression that could only be described as despair. It was similar to Touri's when Reiri had gone missing...

LABEL: 0x4F95
STRING: 「Even so...」

LABEL: 0x4FB3
STRING: 「Even so, you would have tried to save him.」

LABEL: 0x4FEF
STRING: Hiragino suddenly stopped trembling after hearing my words.

LABEL: 0x5036
STRING: 「As long as they're alive, you must try to save them.」

LABEL: 0x5082
STRING: 「...That's what I've believed until now.」

LABEL: 0x5143
STRING: 「But, when I saw him there in pain, I wavered.」

LABEL: 0x5185
STRING: 「Was it really for his sake that I'd let him live?」

LABEL: 0x5234
STRING: ――Why are you saying that?

LABEL: 0x5266
STRING: Hiragino held the value of life and the importance of living

LABEL: 0x5298
STRING: as the core of his beliefs as a human being,

LABEL: 0x52D2
STRING: not just as the values given to him from the outside for being a doctor.

LABEL: 0x5312
STRING: You, who stubbornly tried to be a doctor, who preached the importance of living...

LABEL: 0x535A
STRING: What could make you waver like that――?!

LABEL: 0x5446
STRING: 「When I was a research doctor, a woman I was close to at the time gave me a book.」

LABEL: 0x548A
STRING: 「Mori Ogai's "Takasebune"―it's a famous story, so you've probably read it.」

LABEL: 0x54DB
STRING: 「...Well, at least the summary.」

LABEL: 0x5503
STRING: "Takasebune"――

LABEL: 0x551F
STRING: A story about a younger brother who failed to kill himself.

LABEL: 0x5549
STRING: His older brother Kisuke, who aided him in his agony and put an end to his suffering, was exiled to an island as a criminal.

LABEL: 0x55A9
STRING: It was a short but thought-provoking story that examined the pros and cons of euthanasia.

LABEL: 0x5653
STRING: 「I still don't understand why Kisuke looked so happy.」

LABEL: 0x56A7
STRING: 「...People can't be explained so easily.」

LABEL: 0x56EC
STRING: Hiragino exhaled and raised his head.

LABEL: 0x571C
STRING: With a distant and somewhat farsighted look in his eyes, there was no telling where his true feelings lay.

LABEL: 0x57DC
STRING: 「Let me tell you a little more about my past since we're here.」

LABEL: 0x5819
STRING: 「S-Sure...」

LABEL: 0x5846
STRING: 「I once saved someone important to me when they were on the verge of death... in exchange for someone else's life.」

LABEL: 0x58C8
STRING: 「But, did I really do it for her sake?」

LABEL: 0x5912
STRING: 「Was that what she wanted? Or...」

LABEL: 0x5952
STRING: 「...I've been worrying about it for the past seven years.」

LABEL: 0x598A
STRING: 「Even though I've put myself in life-threatening situations just to keep my mind off it...」

LABEL: 0x59D8
STRING: 「Even though I've stubbornly lectured others on the importance of life...」

LABEL: 0x5A78
STRING: 「...I still don't have an answer.」

LABEL: 0x5AAB
STRING: Hiragino wasn't looking at me anymore.

LABEL: 0x5ADD
STRING: Seven years ago... The Aqualine accident.

LABEL: 0x5B68
STRING: On that day when so many lives were lost in an unprecedented multi-collision accident, some of them must have sunk into this bay.

LABEL: 0x5BD0
STRING: Their many lives filled the bottom of the deep sea――

LABEL: 0x5BFE
STRING: Where endless death kept piling up.

LABEL: 0x5CE2
STRING: I recalled how Hiragino had made a grim face in the observation deck before the <SHEEP III> had dived.

LABEL: 0x5D39
STRING: What he was looking at was the <Isle of Wind>―a white grave marker which no longer served as a painful reminder, but as a triumph of science.

LABEL: 0x5DFC
STRING: ...What kind of feelings did Hiragino hold toward the <SHEEP III>――?

LABEL: 0x5E42
STRING: 「It was only a few months before that when she gave me the "Takasebune."」

LABEL: 0x5E8E
STRING: 「Maybe she was expecting something like that would happen sooner or later.」

LABEL: 0x5EEE
STRING: 「It wasn't a suicide note, but... I think it was a message in her own way...」

LABEL: 0x5F42
STRING: 「...That's nothing more than my imagination, of course, but I can't help but feel that way.」

LABEL: 0x5F91
STRING: The message contained in the "Takasebune."

LABEL: 0x5FC1
STRING: The dying brother who begged for Kisuke to kill him.

LABEL: 0x5FF5
STRING: If you care about me, if you love me, then――

LABEL: 0x609C
STRING: Hiragino, however...

LABEL: 0x617A
STRING: 「So, I tried not to make a mistake this time.」

LABEL: 0x61B2
STRING: 「That's what I thought...」

LABEL: 0x6208
STRING: 「Did I end up making another mistake?」

LABEL: 0x6240
STRING: 「Should I really have killed him with my own hands?」

LABEL: 0x627B
STRING: Did he not come to a conclusion?

LABEL: 0x62B1
STRING: In spite of that, he was still hesitating.

LABEL: 0x62E9
STRING: I had no answer to his aimless question.

LABEL: 0x632B
STRING: The thoughts he let out could only disappear in vain.

LABEL: 0x6381
STRING: Then, I noticed something...

LABEL: 0x63A7
STRING: The cross that should have been hanging on Hiragino's neck was no longer there.

LABEL: 0x641C
STRING: 「No... It was not a mistake.」

LABEL: 0x6444
STRING: 「This choice is not wrong.」

LABEL: 0x6475
STRING: The man who had killed his brother was banished to the east of Eden.

LABEL: 0x64AD
STRING: Even so, it was said that the spirit of the younger brother who had been killed by the older would not stop screaming.

LABEL: 0x64F1
STRING: It was said he kept appealing to his brother and wailed until his bloodline was destroyed.

LABEL: 0x6537
STRING: Did the voices of the dead really bless the living?

LABEL: 0x6573
STRING: Where were we headed, blindfolded and burdened with our sins, I wondered.

LABEL: 0x661A
STRING: Where could we go?

LABEL: 0x665E
STRING: A lone ship drifted through the night sea.

LABEL: 0x66DF
STRING: This ship, too, carried people marred in sin aboard while drifting through the dark sea.

LABEL: 0x6723
STRING: Hiragino's sin.

LABEL: 0x6741
STRING: My sin.

LABEL: 0x675F
STRING: Hiragino had killed a single person with the intention of giving him peace,

LABEL: 0x67A3
STRING: and I had killed countless people unintentionally and without knowing.

LABEL: 0x67DF
STRING: Who would accuse us for our crimes?

LABEL: 0x6860
STRING: Unlike the ship in that story, the <SHEEP III> would not be going anywhere.

LABEL: 0x68B5
STRING: It was a broken ship, drifting silently in the waves.

LABEL: 0x68E5
STRING: God, I――
